availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Clifton McDonald (Louisville, KY, book binder)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, book binder. Kentucky native. Married to Mattie M. Warren McDonald in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on August 30, 1862. Father of Mary McDonald and Rosa McDonald. Book binder in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 309.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 10, p. 357B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482709, p. 119.
"John Clifton McDonald (1839-1927r)," Find A Grave, Memorial #110888272, accessed March 16, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110888272.
KYR-0001-029-0070.
